frame.nav: The vertical lift linkage of New Holland Constructionâ€™s Super Boom ensures that the higher the load is lifted, the farther forward the load can be placed.

nav.SubTitle: Easy entrance and exit to/from cab

frame.nav: Operators will appreciate the optional cab enclosure, with optional air conditioning to keep them cool, productive and alert on the hottest days.
The durable tracks effectively work over sensitive turf, rough ground and in wet, muddy and sandy conditions with less compaction.

The low center of gravity and wide stance provides an excellent ride and allows the machine to travel with a full bucket over the roughest terrain without worry of spillage material or unexpected tipping.

nav.SubTitle: Easy access to engine and service ports

frame.nav: With easy access to routine maintenance points, daily maintenance chores are lowered and the bottom line is increased.
With no rear frame towers to block the view, New Holland Construction compact track loaders provide industry-leading visibility.
Our patent-pending design is robust for long life, keeping maintenance to a minimum.
Standard two speed transmission increases productivity. Low speed for pushing into a pile, and high speed for traveling at up to eight miles per hour.
